title: kormeko
author: kormeko
content: I want to buy USDT for cash, I live in Florida, WEST PALM BEACH. Can anyone help me? I would need about 90K USDT. I would be interested in all possibilities.Thx

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: Post contact info and a rate you’re looking to pay.

comments.body: For exchange rate discussions, my contact details are as follows:nutrimpexhu@gmail.comTEL/Whatsup: +381638037373

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: That’s the coin exchange in Miami? What’s the catch

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Is there any reason you are not able to use a no KYC exchange like Localcoinswap (https://localcoinswap.com/buy/usdt-trc20).They support a number of altcoins, including almost all popular stablecoins.Your approach could be risky either to you or the seller.
